Opening a File

To open a file in its associated application in StarTeam, click File > Open. If the file does not launch, an association may not have been created for the correct editor.

 

To set a default editor:

  1. If a file type does not have an associated editor, go to Windows Explorer.

  2. Select Tools > Folder Options.  This action displays the Folder Options dialog.

  3. Select the File Types tab.

  4. On this tab, highlight the file extension.

  5. Click Advanced. This action displays the Edit File Type dialog.

  6. Click New to change the setting for files of this type.

  7. On the following dialog, enter the required information.

  8. Click OK.
